Class TreeTapBlock

java.lang.Object
net.minecraft.world.level.block.state.BlockBehaviour
net.minecraft.world.level.block.Block
com.technologica.world.level.block.FourDirectionBlock
com.technologica.world.level.block.TreeTapBlock
All Implemented Interfaces:
net.minecraft.world.flag.FeatureElement, net.minecraft.world.level.ItemLike, net.minecraftforge.common.extensions.IForgeBlock
public class TreeTapBlock extends FourDirectionBlock
Special one-off class for tree taps. Created to handle voxel shape and animation.
